duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform customer transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and account transfers with accuracy and efficiency.
Comply with banking regulations and guidelines to ensure the security of bank and customer assets.
Attend to customer inquiries, resolve issues, and promote banking products and services to meet customer needs.
Conduct teller functions such as check cashing, processing loan payments, and providing account information.
Maintain a balanced cash drawer and resolve discrepancies in accordance with bank policies.
Contribute to achieving branch goals by identifying opportunities to cross-sell and refer customers to appropriate specialists.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Banking or finance-related degree preferred)
